column2: "Oh hey! Long time no see partner."
"What am I up to? Same as ever, looking for someone. That's why I became an ARKS after all."
"It's taken some time, but I've finally been able to go to different planets and search around."
"\"What kind of person am I searching for?\" I don't know either, it was 10 years ago when she disappeared."
"I've been doing a pretty thorough sweep on foot, I think."
"If I give up, then there's no way I'll ever meet her again, so I just have to believe I'll find her someday."
"I'm going to keep looking. Later partner."
